function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling and manipulation of virus samples may lead to accidental exposure and transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among laboratory personnel and surrounding environment.","Mitigation":"Adherence to strict biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and proper training in handling and manipulation of virus samples.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and appropriate disinfection protocols.","People":"Laboratory personnel and surrounding individuals in the environment.","Owner":"Laboratory personnel, biosafety officers, and laboratory management."}]}
